summary: Talsgar can now wear Cicero / Jester or Sheogorath outfits.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]Talsgar can now be found wandering Skyrim's lands wearing either Sheogorath's clothes, or the Jester's clothes (Same ones Cicero wears). Best part? You get to choose what he'll be wearing!

[color=red]USE ONLY ONE ESP AT A TIME[/color][/size]



[size=3][center][color=red]----My Other Mods----[/color]
Click below!

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53784/?]M'aiq is a Khajiit in a suit![/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53782/?]J'zargo can be a fancy Khajiit too![/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53886/?]Talsgar's got new clothes![/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53881/?]Summon a Riekling minion![/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53887/?]Summon more creatures with Twin Souls perk![/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62319/?]A new town near Lakeview Manor at Pinewatch![/url][/center][/size]
author: The0neDemigod
